name: Trackius.ai
description: Trackius is a real-time media intelligence platform designed to help cryptocurrency traders monitor content across major media and social platforms. It enables users to create customized feeds that track specific accounts, keywords, visual elements (such as logos or animals), and spoken phrases from sources including X (Twitter), TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Reddit, and global news outlets. The platform delivers structured alerts based on user-defined filters through its dashboard, Telegram, Discord or WebSocket integrations. Trackius applies AI-driven analysis to extract signals from text, video, image, and audio formats. Its utility token, $TKUS, grants access to platform tiers, unlocks advanced features, and enables subscription-free usage for holders who meet balance thresholds.
